announcements.announcement:
PHP Function List
**releases/5_0_4.php** doesn't exist. Closest matches:
- [sem_release](/manual/en/function.sem-release.php) - [ncurses_putp](/manual/en/function.ncurses-putp.php) - [trader_ppo](/manual/en/function.trader-ppo.php) - [reflectionclass](/manual/en/class.reflectionclass.php) - [event_base_loop](/manual/en/function.event-base-loop.php) - [restore_include_path](/manual/en/function.restore-include-path.php) - [ncurses_scr_dump](/manual/en/function.ncurses-scr-dump.php) - [ncurses_prefresh](/manual/en/function.ncurses-prefresh.php) - [trader_ht_phasor](/manual/en/function.trader-ht-phasor.php) - [yaf_request_http](/manual/en/class.yaf-request-http.php) - [ncurses_flushinp](/manual/en/function.ncurses-flushinp.php) - [parle_parser](/manual/en/class.parle-parser.php) - [session_save_path](/manual/en/function.session-save-path.php) - [ncurses_echo](/manual/en/function.ncurses-echo.php) - [ncurses_new_panel](/manual/en/function.ncurses-new-panel.php) - [stripslashes](/manual/en/function.stripslashes.php) - [ncurses_typeahead](/manual/en/function.ncurses-typeahead.php) - [ncurses_inch](/manual/en/function.ncurses-inch.php) - [stream_resolve_include_path](/manual/en/function.stream-resolve-include-path.php) - [ncurses_del_panel](/manual/en/function.ncurses-del-panel.php) - [get_class_methods](/manual/en/function.get-class-methods.php) - [trader_linearreg_slope](/manual/en/function.trader-linearreg-slope.php) - [ncurses_slk_touch](/manual/en/function.ncurses-slk-touch.php) - [ncurses_top_panel](/manual/en/function.ncurses-top-panel.php) - [ncurses_beep](/manual/en/function.ncurses-beep.php) - [ncurses_init_pair](/manual/en/function.ncurses-init-pair.php) - [px_create_fp](/manual/en/function.px-create-fp.php) - [ncurses_move_panel](/manual/en/function.ncurses-move-panel.php) - [runkit_class_adopt](/manual/en/function.runkit-class-adopt.php) - [ncurses_show_panel](/manual/en/function.ncurses-show-panel.php)

module.id: updated bundled libmbfl library (used for multibyte functions). (moriyoshi)

change.description: Bug [#31911](http://bugs.php.net/31911) (mb_decode_mimeheader() is case-sensitive to hex escapes)
Bug [#30573](http://bugs.php.net/30573) (compiler warnings in libmbfl due to invalid type cast)
Bug [#30549](http://bugs.php.net/30549) (incorrect character translations for some ISO8859 charsets)
